message: I think this is a fair starting point, considering the inflation factor will be much more impactful on Bob's side.
Alice, my turn.  Let's be realistic.  I'm hit harder by inflation as the game goes on. This offer helps me out early, and still leaves you with a decent amount.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think this is still a fair split given the inflation factor.  Let's get this done.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. You're being obstinate.  I'm proposing a deal where I get more, reflecting the time pressure on my side. This is my final offer.
